back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Mystic cards ([mystic]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5, up to five level 0 cards from any other class. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Jim's Trumpet, Final Rhapsody, 1 random basic weakness.

deck_options.error: You cannot have more than 5 cards that are not Mystic or Neutral

flavor: "No, not quiet at all. Dead folks get downright rambunctious when I play my horn."
name: Jim Culver
text:
Treat the modifier on [skull] tokens you reveal as "0."
Anytime you reveal a [elder_sign] token, you may choose to instead treat it as a [skull] token.
[elder_sign] effect: +1.

name: Blue Note
text:
Jim Culver deck only. Replacement.
Fast. Play when you reveal a [skull] chaos token during a skill test. Draw 2 cards and gain 1 resource, or draw 1 card and gain 2 resources.
If your deck has 5 or more cards in it, shuffle Blue Note back into your deck instead of discarding it.

name: Sepulchral Resonance
text:
Jim Culver deck only. Replacement.
Do not reveal chaos tokens from the chaos bag for this test. Treat the chaos token revealed for this test as a [skull], ignoreing its effects (except for its modifier).
When this test ends, if your deck has 5 or more cards in it, shuffle Sepulchral Resonance back into your deck instead of discarding it.

name: Herald of the End
text: Jim Culver deck only. Replacement. Prey - Jim Culver only. Aloof. Hunter. Forced - If a [skull] token is revealed during a skill test at this location: Herald of the End attacks an investigator at this location.
